subject: Horse Racing

Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
organizations: National Museum of Racing and Hall of Fame
lead_paragraph: Mr. Whiteley was a thoroughbred racing Hall of Famer who trained the brilliant but ill-fated filly Ruffian.
